name: Cumdy
description:
Cumdy is a stripping game where folklore creatures remove clothing and grow to like you as you combine candies. Whether it is a werewolf or the Horror of December himself, Krampus, they are at your mercy thanks to your magical handcuffs!

Features

  • 🍬 Quick and casual runs of around 10 minutes
  • 🍭 A playground where you can rewatch unlocked scenes
  • 🐺 Two creatures (with more planned for upcoming holidays)
  • 🎀 Themed artwork and candies matching each holiday
  • 🧁 Trick buttons if you are having a hard time and need to get to the juice quicker!
  • 🏅 Steam achievements
  • ☁️ Unlocked scenes and best score saved on Steam Cloud
